WorkItem.Description:
I use the export -> copy pawn string to clipboard function in the rawr.mage category.  This is the string
that was exported:
 
 
( Pawn: v1: "Rawr": Health=0.00, Stamina=0.00, Intellect=2.01, SpellPower=1.28, CritRating=0.62, HitRating=1.22, HasteRating=0.70, Mp5=0.33, FireSpellDamage=0.05, ArcaneSpellDamage=1.23 )
 
Mastery doesn't appear, but it did appear in the on-screen version (with a value of 0.7).
 
This is a small bug now that I know to look for it, but I'm sure I missed it for a while...
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Export to Pawn Doesn't Include Mastery

Comments.Message: I've got the same problem with my warrior and some other stats besides mastery (but mastery too). I think it were Strength and MeleeDPS. I'm relatively sure that this stats are in the export string from rawr but for some reason when I import the string they don't appear in the Pawn Addon.
I thought we fixed this already
Are you sure you guys are running the current version (.19)?
Wait, nvm, found the problem, fixing it now.
Thanks Jothay; I appreciate you looking into it.
